item.title: Christmas Cracker
item.dc:creator: @Eson Eson
item.description:
@Eson wrote:

okay , i am using Exion Source and i want A christmas cracker(962) that if you click it , to give you a santa hat (1050) i added this to
Clickitem.java ;

if(itemId == 962) { c.getItems().deleteItem(962, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1050, 1); c.sendMessage("Merry Christmas!!!."); }

But now i have no idea what to do next to make it work , can any1 help me?

Read full topic
